title: Sexiest ALS Ice Bucket Challenge Ever - The GameOverGreggy Show
description:
Full Episode Friday! Get it EARLY here! http://gameovergreggy.bandcamp.com

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Buy our shirts! http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

Each and every Friday, Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, Nick Scarpino, and Tim Gettys get together to talk. Each podcaster brings a topic to the table, and then, they go. TV, space, books, movies -- anything goes.

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody we're the cast of The GameOverGreggy Show and SEI 47 over on Twitter has challenged us to the ALS Ice Bucket Challenge if you didn't know this is raising money for the ALS Association alsa.org you go there you donate some money or you do what we're about to do and dump water on ice water on yourself when you not they nominated us we have to nominate three other people so we're nominating Harley from Epic Meal Time Barbara from Rooster Teeth and the entire cast of The Comedy Button uh we're going to donate $100 of The Game Over Grey Show money for this and right now we're going to dump the water on me but the the challenge for our three people there our three nominations you have to make a video sexier than [Music] this that's a lot of work that's a lot of work [Music] cool
